resources.string: To change the Theme you have to start the App afterwards again
To change your name please click here
Cannot connect to the MoveSense device

This app demonstrates how to connect to the Movesense sensor.
 - First scan for BLE devices and then connect to it by clicking it on the list.
 - Connected devices are shown on the list with ***.
 - Clicking on connected device will show device info.
 - Long click on connected device will disconnect.

You can follow daily running with this app.
 You can track your route via GPS and the heartbeat via an external sensor.
 You can watch this at MyRuns.
 You can also make predictions about the next run.
 If you do not want that the app know your GPS position or use Bluetooth, you can prohibit this under Settings.
 Please also enter a name under Settings.
Here you can see details about the last run:
